problem_statement: Manual handling of financial transactions in a fintech environment can lead to delayed processing, incorrect balances, and incomplete audit records. The objective of this project is to build a Node.jsâ€“based Financial Transaction Processor that manages bank accounts and supports deposits, withdrawals, and transfers while enforcing strict validation rules. The system must accurately track balances, prevent invalid transactions, and maintain a complete transaction history to ensure correctness, reliability, and auditability.
